summary: Seven geniuses, with IQs over 200, are plucked from their lives on Christmas Eve to try to solve the world's problems in one night.
cast: Tom Sizemore|Stephen Baldwin|Jacob Bonnema|Tricia Helfer|Matt Medrano|Philip Moon|Paula Jai Parker|Huntley Ritter|Jack Scalia|Carol Abney|Delaine Yates|Arch Bonnema|Jack Guzman|Evan Grayson|Rachel Wittman|Michelle Crompton|Dimitri Diatchenko|Gary Dikeos|James S. Goff|Bryan Harris|Craig T. Kelly|Bill Lippincott|Robert Maratea|Dana Pacheco|David Pease|Krista Stilley|Jacob Swanson
director: Director: Timothy A. Chey (as Tim Chey)
title: The Genius Club
